title: "Get the Glass" Type ID??
content:
anyone know off hand this font used for the word “Busted”? any help appreciated. thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [busted.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063833/http:/typophile.com/files/busted.jpg) | 85.36 KB |

 [‹ Beautiful Serif typo ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063833/http:/typophile.com/node/49509 "Go to previous forum topic") [NICK CATCHDUBS SLICK font id ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063833/http:/typophile.com/node/49513 "Go to next forum topic")
author: eburke

comments.content:
I’m sorry.  
“Glass” is B. agency.  
Busted is futura bold.
sweet. fast! what about the word “busted”?

I think BUSTED is [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063833/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/neufville/futura-nd/) Bold.

- Mike Yanega
